name: Alien Escape (itch) (xlandrexl)
description:
Welcome to Alien Escape!

Alien Escape is my first game, and was developed as a project for a university asignment. I am happy that it is also a fun game, which despite being short for now, will give some joy and challenge to your day.

Discover the Alien Escape world interacting with it and avoiding the Slims controlled by the Mr. Alien! 

Raise the difficulty if you are up for a challenge, and see who can finish with the least number of deaths!

Any feedback is very well received, so I can decide the future of this world :)

Thanks a lot for being in this page, and even more if you give it a try. 

Sincerely,

André
